creditline: Gift of Mrs. Charles S. Pillsbury, Phillip Winston Pillsbury, Mary Stinson Pillsbury Lord, Katherine Stevens Pillsbury McKee and Helen Winston Pillsbury Becker in memory of Charles S. Pillsbury
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: hairpin or ornament, filigree pin, finial Dragon-fish, set with turquoise (one left), gold cire perdue with bezels and granulation.  Note: Dragon-fish: if the cargo gets up the rapids on the Yellow River between Shensi and Shansi, it becomes a dragon (like graduating)
title: Hairpin
